participant_1.background:
I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms.
I have a system for doing laundry that works well for me.
I like to listen to the band Red Hot Chili Peppers to remember my dad.
i volunteer in my son s boy scout troop.
i freeze up in social situations.

participant_2.background:
I'm single and enjoy my freedom to drive around with the wind in my hair.
I have a pet dog that helps me cope with my emotions.
I love the freedom of riding my motorcycle, and I look forward to one day taking my kids on rides with me.
i like eating pretzels.
None of my family members work in the medical field.

content.text: Good so far! I'm just getting ready to go for a ride on my motorcycle.
Nice! I love riding motorcycles. Do you have any kids?
Not yet, but I'm looking forward to one day having kids and taking them on rides with me.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great parent.
Thanks! I hope so. What do you do for fun?
I volunteer in my son's boy scout troop. It's a lot of fun and I get to spend time with my son.
That's awesome! I'm sure your son really appreciates it.
Yeah, he does. I like to make music too. Do you play any instruments?
I don't, but I like to listen to music. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite band is the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
Oh, I like them too! They're a great band.
Yeah, they are. I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I'm sure we'll get along great.
